sentences.en: a baseball bat/team/stadium
sentences.cn: 棒球球棒 / 球队 / 球场

sentences.en: Balloon, baseball, basketball, football and volleyball all dance  ballet on the  volcano.
sentences.cn: 气球、棒球、篮球、足球和排球都在火山上跳芭蕾舞。

sentences.en: Casey Stengel was probably the most colorful character in baseball.
sentences.cn: 凯西·施滕格尔可能是棒球界最有趣的人物。

sentences.en: Dick fell for baseball when he was a little boy.
sentences.cn: 当迪克还是个小孩时，他就迷恋上了棒球运动。

sentences.en: Do you like baseball?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢打棒球吗?。

sentences.en: He buys rare baseball cards on eBay.
sentences.cn: 他从易趣网上购买珍稀的棒球卡。

sentences.en: He departed baseball in the '60s.
sentences.cn: 他在20世纪60年代告别了棒球场。

sentences.en: He likes baseball.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢棒球。

sentences.en: He maliciously damaged a car with a baseball bat.
sentences.cn: 他用棒球棒恶意损毁了一辆汽车。

sentences.en: He umpired baseball games.
sentences.cn: 他担任棒球比赛的裁判。

sentences.en: He was the fastest thing I ever saw on a baseball field.
sentences.cn: 他是我在棒球场上见过的跑得最快的家伙。

sentences.en: He wears his baseball cap back to front.
sentences.cn: 他把棒球帽反戴着。

sentences.en: He's wearing a deeply unappealing baseball hat.
sentences.cn: 他戴着一顶很不起眼的棒球帽。

sentences.en: His cane answered for a baseball bat.
sentences.cn: 他的手杖可代用棒球棒。

sentences.en: I picked up his baseball bat and swung at the man's head.
sentences.cn: 我捡起他的棒球棒朝那个人的头打去。

sentences.en: Kids used to trade baseball cards.
sentences.cn: 以前孩子们常常互相交换棒球卡片。

sentences.en: Now baseball is trying to get in on the European market.
sentences.cn: 现在，棒球正试图进入欧洲市场。

sentences.en: That man over there used to be one of the best players in baseball .
sentences.cn: 这句话的意思是：那边那个人以前是最好的棒球运动员之一。

sentences.en: That man over there used to be one of the best players in baseball.
sentences.cn: 这句话的意思是：那边那个人以前是最好的棒球运动员之一。

sentences.en: The only baseball he saw was on the tube.
sentences.cn: 他看过的唯一一场棒球赛是在电视上看的。

sentences.en: They came to the baseball field to root for their school team.
sentences.cn: 他们来到棒球场为他们的校队鼓劲。

sentences.en: Two thugs clubbed him with baseball bats.
sentences.cn: 两个暴徒用棒球棒猛击他。

sentences.en: We talked idly about magazines and baseball.
sentences.cn: 我们漫不经心地谈论杂志和棒球。

sentences.en: Yes, I like basketball and baseball.
sentences.cn: 是的，我喜欢篮球和棒球。

trans.tran_en: an outdoor game between two teams of nine players, in which players try to get points by hitting a ball and running around four  base s
